dmca.title: Wind River Complains of Unauthorized News Group Posting (#1)
dmca.body:
03/06/03	10:02 FAX [Private]	WRS LEGAL DEPARTMENT 	001

WIND RIVER
Legal Department
[Private]
Alameda, CA 94501
Legal FAX: [Private]

Facsimile Cover Page

From		[Private]
Direct Dial	[Private]
E-mail 	[Private]@windriver.com

TO		DMCA Complaints
Company	        Google, Inc.
Fax Number	[Private]

Date: 	March 6, 2003

Pages:	2

Please call [Private] if any pages were not received or are illegible.

Comments:

URGENT LEGAL MATTER

PLEASE FORWARD TO LEGAL COUNSEL IMMEDIATELY

The information contained in this facsimile is confidential and attorney privileged information intended only for the use of the recipient named above. If you are not the intended recipient, you are notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication to persons other than the Intended recipient s [sic] prohibited. If you have received this facsimile in error, please notify the sender immediately and return the original and all copies to the above address.


03/06/03	10:02 FAX [Private]	WRS LEGAL DEPARTMENT	002

WindRiver
Direct line: [Private]
[Private]@windriver.com

VIA FACSIMILE [Private] AND EMAIL ([Private]@google.com)

March 6, 2003

	URGENT LEGAL MATTER

Google, Inc.
Attn: DMCA Complaints, User Support	
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

	Re: Unauthorized news group posting

Dear Google Legal Counsel:

It has been brought to our attention that a news posting with the Message ID 3E664OF7_Dl593455@ath.forthnet.gr was made to the newsgroup comp.os.vxworks on March 5, 2003 by a person stating his email address as [private]. The URL for this posting is http://groups.google.com/groups?dq=&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&group=comp.os.vxworks&selm=3E6640F7.D1593455%40ath.forthnet.gr. This posting includes confidential and proprietary information of Wind River Systems, Inc. ("Wind River"), in the form of a key code (25 characters following "SN#:" in the posting) useful to circumvent a technological measure that controls access to computer software -- Tornado(R) 2.2/VxWorks(R) 5_5 -- the copyrights for which are owned by Wind River. Wind River has a good faith belief that this posting was not authorized by Wind River, and may allow for the unlicensed (and therefore illegal) use of Wind River software, as well as the violation of contractual confidentiality requirements.

We must request that Google immediately remove this news posting from its servers and take appropriate measures to prevent its further dissemination.

Should you require further information concerning this matter, please contact me. My contact information is above.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each item identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Very truly yours,


[Private]
Director of Intellectual Property

Wind River Systems, Inc.
[Private] - Alameda, CA 94501 - Phone [Private]- Legal Fax [Private]
